import sys

line = sys.stdin.readline().split()
a = int(line[0])
b = int(line[1])
c = int(line[2])

if b / a <= c:
    print(int(b / a))
else:
    print(c)

a, b, c = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(min(b//a, c))

import sys

A, B, C = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

print(min(B // A, C))
